title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items section of the software, the column icons are not visible.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Avaiable Items section by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software and navigate to the Available Items section.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.

Expected Result: The table icons and column icons should show up.
Actual Result: The column icons are not visible.
